docs.snippet: U.S. combat veterans who served in Iraq and Afghanistan say they are outraged at the temporary ban on immigration from seven Muslim-majority countries that has blocked visas for Iraqi interpreters who risked their lives to help American troops on ...
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. combat veterans who served in Iraq and Afghanistan say they are outraged at the temporary ban on immigration from seven Muslim-majority countries that has blocked visas for Iraqi interpreters who risked their lives to help American troops on the battlefield.

headline.main: Veterans Protest Travel Ban, Saying It Hurts Interpreters
headline.print_headline: Veterans Protest Travel Ban, Saying It Hurts Interpreters

docs.snippet: Aides to U.S. President Donald Trump on Sunday called the implementation of a temporary travel ban on people from seven Muslim-majority countries a "massive success story" despite criticism from some top Republicans, protests and disarray at airpo...
docs.lead_paragraph: Aides to U.S. President Donald Trump on Sunday called the implementation of a temporary travel ban on people from seven Muslim-majority countries a "massive success story" despite criticism from some top Republicans, protests and disarray at airports.

headline.main: Trump Aides Call Travel Ban Success Despite Broad Criticism
headline.print_headline: Trump Aides Call Travel Ban Success Despite Broad Criticism

docs.snippet: Chancellor Angela Merkel said the global fight against terrorism does not warrant putting groups of people under suspicion, adding U.S. President Donald Trump's order to restrict people from seven Muslim-majority countries from entering the United...
docs.lead_paragraph: Chancellor Angela Merkel said the global fight against terrorism does not warrant putting groups of people under suspicion, adding U.S. President Donald Trump's order to restrict people from seven Muslim-majority countries from entering the United States violates the spirit of international cooperation.

headline.main: Merkel Says U.S. Travel Ban Not Justified by Terror Fight
headline.print_headline: Merkel Says U.S. Travel Ban Not Justified by Terror Fight

docs.snippet: Just two days after banning travelers from seven Muslim-majority nations, U.S. President Donald Trump invited the Saudi monarch, whose kingdom includes Islam's holiest sites, to fly to Washington....
docs.lead_paragraph: Just two days after banning travelers from seven Muslim-majority nations, U.S. President Donald Trump invited the Saudi monarch, whose kingdom includes Islam's holiest sites, to fly to Washington.

headline.main: AP Analysis: Trump Travel Ban Risks Straining Mideast Ties
headline.print_headline: AP Analysis: Trump Travel Ban Risks Straining Mideast Ties

docs.snippet: Khudeeda Naif won refuge in the United States as a member of Iraq's Yazidi minority, but what he fears more than religious persecution is retribution for his brother's work as an interpreter for the U.S. army in Iraq....
docs.lead_paragraph: Khudeeda Naif won refuge in the United States as a member of Iraq's Yazidi minority, but what he fears more than religious persecution is retribution for his brother's work as an interpreter for the U.S. army in Iraq.

headline.main: Trump Travel Ban Leaves Iraq's Persecuted Yazidis in Limbo
headline.print_headline: Trump Travel Ban Leaves Iraq's Persecuted Yazidis in Limbo

docs.snippet: Democratic U.S. senators tried to force a vote on a bill to rescind President Donald Trump's order banning travel from seven Muslim-majority nations on Monday, but were blocked by a Republican lawmaker....
docs.lead_paragraph: Democratic U.S. senators tried to force a vote on a bill to rescind President Donald Trump's order banning travel from seven Muslim-majority nations on Monday, but were blocked by a Republican lawmaker.

headline.main: Democrats Set Bills Seeking to Overturn Trump Travel Ban
headline.print_headline: Democrats Set Bills Seeking to Overturn Trump Travel Ban

docs.snippet: Yemen believes that U.S. President Donald Trump's temporary ban on certain Muslims traveling to the United States supports extremists, a news agency run by the Saudi-allied government reported on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Yemen believes that U.S. President Donald Trump's temporary ban on certain Muslims traveling to the United States supports extremists, a news agency run by the Saudi-allied government reported on Sunday.

headline.main: Yemen Says Trump's Travel Ban on Muslims Supports Extremists
headline.print_headline: Yemen Says Trump's Travel Ban on Muslims Supports Extremists

docs.snippet: College officials and policy makers say that new restrictions on travel will affect thousands of students and researchers and set back scientific inquiry....
docs.lead_paragraph: College officials and policy makers say that new restrictions on travel will affect thousands of students and researchers and set back scientific inquiry.

headline.main: Science Will Suffer Under Trump’s Travel Ban, Researchers Say
headline.print_headline: Science Will Suffer Under Administration’s Travel Ban, Officials Say

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Gina Kolata, Amy Harmon, Denise Grady, Benedict Carey and Tatiana Schlossberg.

headline.print_headline: Muslim Civil Rights Group Challenges Trump Travel Ban

docs.snippet: An Oscar-nominated Iranian director said Sunday he will not attend this year's Academy Awards because of a travel ban imposed by President Donald Trump....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Oscar-nominated Iranian director said Sunday he will not attend this year's Academy Awards because of a travel ban imposed by President Donald Trump.

headline.print_headline: Iranian Director to Skip Oscars Over Trump's Travel Ban
